text: Afternoon! Hope you are well. I think this programme is coming to an end but it would be great to continue to chat and so you can update me on how your fabulous music career is going. My email is <mailto:gfeary@cantab.net|gfeary@cantab.net> so if you like, feel free to drop me a message anytime! In the meantime we still have a few hours on this programme so ask away :)
